<iframe style="display: block;margin: 0;borderWidth: 0; padding: 0;" scrolling="no" width="980" height="300" frameborder="0" srcdoc="<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head><base href="https://assets.adnuntius.com/cfaeba/ktljjbhnzrh2vh28b5lccw2dzqn79tyhw7pxsh72d7yxlsn8b6/">
<script>
var adnClickDestination="https://delivery.adnuntius.com/c/D5Kw9BUoewD_C6DIpqdU5WPuI2wRpk8xVv-rHjO827gAAAAQCtjQz9kbGWD4nuZy3q6HaHGLUoKr-PeVBkeEOL-HfY7xok8FNQetD5uJw_y8Rn0an1DoBQlU8R-1uQ-cwOTJ7uok2g2iCpAliScNRFaz229vQN008HJrZC6p8oVDFz94XYdBAdkerUVjsLqXAeqXuLvIgG34EEvJYBKVDEoqx6Oe90sHCrPeMbF_BPQ6dpefG3p-8miaZOXMw5h9m-UpeUFbuslG4q1yB8IkRm76q_DJ4rAebKLe_iIAd48yDrFgetjgpuLSBBdVakArUcU-kx5BhKBBNQLr?r=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chilimobil.no%2Fmobilabonnement%2F1-gb%2F%3Futm_source%3Dc-alt%26utm_medium%3Ddisplay%26utm_campaign%3Dvurdere%26utm_content%3D1GB_amedia";
</script>

  <meta charset="UTF-8" />
  <meta name="ad.size" content="width=980,height=300">
  <script type="text/javascript">
    var clickTag = "https://delivery.adnuntius.com/c/D5Kw9BUoewD_C6DIpqdU5WPuI2wRpk8xVv-rHjO827gAAAAQCtjQz9kbGWD4nuZy3q6HaHGLUoKr-PeVBkeEOL-HfY7xok8FNQetD5uJw_y8Rn0an1DoBQlU8R-1uQ-cwOTJ7uok2g2iCpAliScNRFaz229vQN008HJrZC6p8oVDFz94XYdBAdkerUVjsLqXAeqXuLvIgG34EEvJYBKVDEoqx6Oe90sHCrPeMbF_BPQ6dpefG3p-8miaZOXMw5h9m-UpeUFbuslG4q1yB8IkRm76q_DJ4rAebKLe_iIAd48yDrFgetjgpuLSBBdVakArUcU-kx5BhKBBNQLr?r=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chilimobil.no%2Fmobilabonnement%2F1-gb%2F%3Futm_source%3Dc-alt%26utm_medium%3Ddisplay%26utm_campaign%3Dvurdere%26utm_content%3D1GB_amedia";
  </script>
  <title>Banner Ad</title>
  <style>
    body, html {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      width: 980px;
      height: 300px;
      overflow: hidden;
      background: #fff;
      position: relative;
      font-family: sans-serif;
    }

    #clickArea {
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      width: inherit;
      height: inherit;
      cursor: pointer;
      background-color: #FF4597;
    }

    #sprite {
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      max-width: 100%;
      max-height: 100%;
      z-index: 1;
    }

    #mobile {
      position: absolute;
      top: 30px;
      right: 30px;
      width: 97px;
      z-index: 100;
    }


    #logo {
      position: absolute;
      top: 38px;
      left: 38px;
      width: 126px;
      z-index: 100;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

  <a href="javascript:void(window.open(window.clickTag))" id="clickArea">
    <img src="c1.png" alt="Mobile Animation" id="mobile">
    <img src="01.png" alt="Sprite" id="sprite">
    <img src="logo.png" id="logo">
  </a>
  
  <script>
    const animationSpeed = 460;
  
    let playing = true;
    let useAlt = false;
    let isHovering = false;
  
    const sprite = document.getElementById('sprite');
    const mobileElem = document.getElementById('mobile');
  
    function showFrame(src) {
      sprite.src = src;
    }
  
    function startSpriteLoop() {
      let state = 0;
      function loop() {
        if (!playing) return;
        if (state === 0) {
          showFrame('01.png');
          state = 1;
        } else {
          if (useAlt) {
            showFrame('03.png');
            useAlt = false;
          } else {
            showFrame('02.png');
          }
          state = 0;
        }
        setTimeout(loop, animationSpeed);
      }
      loop();
    }
  
    function triggerAltRandomly() {
      if (!playing) return;
      if (!isHovering) {
        useAlt = true;
      }
      const nextDelay = Math.random() * 3000 + 2000;
      setTimeout(triggerAltRandomly, nextDelay);
    }
  
    const mobileFrames = ['c1.png', 'c2.png', 'c3.png'];
    let mobileFrameIndex = 0;
  
    function startMobileLoop() {
      if (!playing) return;
      mobileElem.src = mobileFrames[mobileFrameIndex];
      mobileFrameIndex = (mobileFrameIndex + 1) % mobileFrames.length;
      setTimeout(startMobileLoop, animationSpeed);
    }
  
    // Force stop after 30 seconds, no matter what
    setTimeout(() => {
      playing = false;
    }, 30000);
  
    document.getElementById('clickArea').addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
      isHovering = true;
    });
  
    document.getElementById('clickArea').addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
      isHovering = false;
    });
  
    startSpriteLoop();
    startMobileLoop();
    triggerAltRandomly();
  </script>

<script>
  const clickArea = document.getElementById('clickArea');
  const logoElem = document.getElementById('logo');

  // Create hover overlay
  const hoverOverlay = document.createElement('img');
  hoverOverlay.src = '04.png';
  hoverOverlay.alt = 'Hover Overlay';
  hoverOverlay.style.position = 'absolute';
  hoverOverlay.style.top = '0';
  hoverOverlay.style.left = '0';
  hoverOverlay.style.width = '100%';
  hoverOverlay.style.height = '100%';
  hoverOverlay.style.zIndex = '10';
  hoverOverlay.style.display = 'none';
  hoverOverlay.style.pointerEvents = 'none'; // Prevents hover interruption
  clickArea.appendChild(hoverOverlay);

  // Hover in
  clickArea.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
    hoverOverlay.style.display = 'block';
    if (logoElem) logoElem.src = 'logo-neg.png';
  });

  // Hover out
  clickArea.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
    hoverOverlay.style.display = 'none';
    if (logoElem) logoElem.src = 'logo.png';
  });
</script>


</body>
</html>">
